recipes.name: Beet Tartare
recipes.description: Boldly seasoned and finely chopped, these beets have the earthy taste of classic beef tartare, and look the part too

recipes.name: Cranberry Orange Sauce With Cinnamon
recipes.description: Bright citrus and warming cinnamon are the complements cranberries look for this time of the year, and navel oranges conveniently come into season just in time for the holiday

recipes.name: Balsamic-Roasted Brussels Sprouts
recipes.description: These deeply caramelized, tender, flavorful sprouts get coated in a simple, sweet-savory sauce

recipes.name: Lemon-Oregano Shrimp and Tiny Potatoes
recipes.description: This weeknight dinner is anything but bland thanks to the flavorful combination of garlic, capers and fresh shrimp

recipes.name: Chile-Vinegar-Marinated Cornish Game Hens
recipes.description: Hens with a fiery, tangy chile marinade inspired by Goan recheado masala.

recipes.name: Rosemary-Sizzled Salami, Dates, and Pecans
recipes.description: Salty, crunchy, sweet, and meaty, this warm mix is a combination of party appetizer heavy hitters

recipes.name: Raspberry-Almond Thumbprint Cookies
recipes.description: Crispy on the outside, chewy on the inside.

recipes.name: Chocolate Paradis With Almond Praline
recipes.description: Caramelized almonds make this dense, velvety chocolate mousse party-ready.

recipes.name: Citrus Caramel Sundaes With Toasted Almonds
recipes.description: Tangy, floral citrus soaks up dark, smoky caramel for a sweet, sticky sundae unlike any other.

recipes.name: Strip Steak With Umami Butter Sauce
recipes.description: Strip steak cover with a 5-ingredient sauce made in house.

recipes.name: Charred Eggplant With Spicy Tomato Sauce and Peanuts
recipes.description: Spicy charred tomato sauce inspired by the Thai condiment nam prik complements silky grilled eggplant and crunchy.

recipes.name: Roasted Chicken With Tomatoes
recipes.description: Tomato salad with a lemony, oniony roast chicken on top
